pullrequest.title: Destroy actions created in MainWindow (fixes TimePanel_TEST)

content.raw: meh, I tried doing this with a `std::vector<QAction*>`, but calling delete on the entries in the vector didn't seem to deallocate the QActions outside of the `MainWindow` where the vector was stored. Anyone have any insights here? It's not required for this PR, but it would make this a lot nicer if we could iterate through all the actions rather than typing out all 46 of them.
content.html: meh, I tried doing this with a std::vector<QAction*>, but calling delete on the entries in the vector didn't seem to deallocate the QActions outside of the MainWindow where the vector was stored. Anyone have any insights here? It's not required for this PR, but it would make this a lot nicer if we could iterate through all the actions rather than typing out all 46 of them.
